title: Adam DeVine
itunes:title: Adam DeVine
description:
Adam Devine is a relentlessly funny actor, comedian, singer, screenwriter and producer known for co-creating and starring in Workaholics and Adam DeVine's House Party.  Other credits include Modern Family and Pitch Perfect just to name a few.  Adam and Whitney talk his recent engagement Covid wedding planning, and Adam almost overdoses on liquids. Tune in for two entertainers wildly entertaining each other and us.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
